tab1.title: Sample tab title-1
tab1.content: The top day schools of India were identified on the basis of education, excellence and performance. The evaluation has been done on  the basis of teacher welfare and development, competence of faculty, sports education, special needs education, co-curricular education, value for money, infrastructure provision, academic reputation, individual attention to students,

tab2.title: Sample tab title-1
tab2.content: Leadership/management quality, parental involvement, internationalism, community service, life skills education and conflict management.
